channel.title: Fosdem on Inductive Bias
channel.description: Recent content in Fosdem on Inductive Bias

item.title: FOSDEM 2018 - recap
item.description: FOSDEM 2018 - recap # Too crowded, too many queues, too little space - but also lots of friendly people, Belgian waffles, ice cream, an ASF dinner with grey beards and new people, a busy ASF booth, bumping into friends every few steps, meeting humans you see only online for an entire year or more: For me, that’s the gist of this year’s FOSDEM. Note: German version of the article including images appeared in my employer’s tech blog.
